article:
It is well that young men should begin at the beginning and occupy the least important positions.  _  of the leading businessmen of Pittsburgh had a serious responsibility placed upon them at the very  _  of
their career.They were  _  to the broom , spending the first hours of their business lives  sweeping out  the office.
         And here is the basic  _  of success, the great secret:  _  your energy, thought, and capital  wholly on the business in which you are  _  .Having begun in one line, determine to fight it out on that  _  , to
lead in it, adopt every  _  , have the best machinery, and
know the most about it.
         The companies which fail are those which have  _  their capital, which
means that they have scattered their brains  _  .They have investments in this, or that, or  the other  , here, there, and everywhere."Don't put all your eggs in one basket" is all  _  , I tell you."Put all your eggs in one basket, and then  _  that basket".Look round you and take  _  ; men who do that do
not often fail.It is easy to watch and carry the one basket.It is trying to carry too many baskets  _  breaks
most eggs in this country.He who  _  three baskets must put one on his  _  , which is likely to fall down.One  _  of the American
businessman is lack of concentration.
         Remember: put all your eggs in one basket, and watch that basket.  _  Emerson says, "no one can cheat you out of final success but yourselves."
